skeditorapp: QMenuBar::item:selected{background-color: rgb(110, 110, 110);} QMenu::item:pressed, QMenu::item:selected { background-color: rgb(110, 110, 110);}QWidget {background-color: rgb(46, 47, 48);color: rgb(243, 243, 243);}
projectarea: QTreeWidget {show-decoration-selected: 0;} QTreeWidget QHeaderView::section{min-height: 25;background-color: rgb(20, 133, 145);border-top-left-radius: 8px;border-top-right-radius: 8px;}QTreeWidget{background: rgb(74, 76, 78);} QWidget{border-top-left-radius: 8px;border-top-right-radius: 8px;}  QScrollBar:vertical{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100);width: 15px;margin: 1px 3px 1px 3px;border: 1px transparent #424242;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::handle:vertical{background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30);min-height: 5px;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical{border: none;background: none;} ProjectTreeItem{background-color: transparent; color: rgb(243, 243, 243); text-align: left; border-radius: 0px;}QTreeWidget::item:selected {background-color: rgb(20, 133, 145);} QTreeWidget::item:hover {background-color: rgb(20, 100, 125);}
editor: QWidget{background-color: rgb(64, 66, 68);border: 1;}QTabBar{background-color: rgb(46, 52, 54);}QTabBar::tab {background: rgb(153, 153, 153);border-top-left-radius: 8px;border-top-right-radius: 8px;min-width: 8ex;padding: 2px;margin-right: 2px;margin-bottom: 1px;color: rgb(255, 255, 255);}QTabBar::tab:selected, QTabBar::tab:hover {background: rgb(17, 120, 130);}QTabBar::tab:!selected {margin-top: 2px;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);} QScrollBar::horizontal{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100);height: 11px;margin: 1px 3px 1px 3px;border: 1px transparent #424242;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::handle:horizontal{background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30);min-width: 5px;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal{border: none;background: none;} QScrollBar::vertical{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100);width: 15px;margin: 1px 3px 1px 3px;border: 1px transparent #424242;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::handle:vertical{background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30);min-height: 5px;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical{border: none;background: none;}

outputframe.hidebtn: QPushButton{background: rgb(17, 120, 130); color: rgb(243, 243, 243); border: 0px;min-height: 20px; max-width: 50px; color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-top-left-radius: 8px;border-top-right-radius: 8px;} QPushButton::disabled{background: rgb(140, 140, 140);}
outputframe.outarea: QPlainTextEdit{background-color: rgb(64, 66, 68); color: rgb(255, 255, 200);} QScrollBar:vertical{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100);width: 15px;margin: 1px 3px 1px 3px;border: 1px transparent #424242;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::handle:vertical{background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30);min-height: 5px;border-radius: 4px;}QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical{border: none;background: none;}
